title: Aurelion Sol's VO just landed!

embed.description: This is the voice for the new champion Aurelion Sol. Note: The Voice might not be final, you never know what tweaks Riot might make to it. For League of Legends Related News Check Out Surrender@20: http://www.surrenderat20.net/ Feel Free to Follow me on Twitter as well: https://twitter.com/SkinSpotlights

body: Have a listen to the star forger's sultry tones and condescending VO!

replies.body:
BOOP
BOOP
BOOP

> BOOP
> BOOP
> BOOP

3 boops...

inb4 three auto attack on-hit effect...
Uhm. I presume it's for when people get hit by his passive.
I think it's what he says, when he idles while something might run into his passive, like Kindred singing, when they idle.

Awww yeah!  I got a line in this batch!  Woohoo! :D  

TO ATOMS!!!

(I've not finished listening to them all myself, and standard Bioluminescence disclaimer applies (I'm not on the Narrative team) but they DO let me submit suggestions for champ VO lines, and when I'm very very lucky, they use a few.  I'm going to keep listening and see if there are any others, but I'm too excited.)

If you don't mind me asking Bio, what lines did you make?

ok now i'm pissed at whoever wrote the line 'runeterra: the word itself means magic earth'
Rune means MYSTERY, not magic! :P (and a world of mystery would be a good explanation for it catching his attention too!)
RuneTerra=RuneScape confirmed?!

Sent this to the rest of the rioters: Aurelion Sol is a Pimp.

"Put it on my tab. the name's Pantheon, with a P".


"A Snow Globe. Perfect for my colle- to Destroy you...DESTROY YOU!!!" 


http://www.quickmeme.com/img/02/028e5d3a9072cdd5bd82b591ca21741d15fa185f41d3719d29e64369316141f4.jpg
Top 2 aside from the "Boops"
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CdDjwW6UMAAhCU-.jpg:large
Does that mean Aurelion Sol actually means "I love you" during those boops?

> [{quoted}](name=lightdragoon88,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=jdycZE5Z,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2016-03-08T21:11:10.594+0000)

> "A Snow Globe. Perfect for my colle- to Destroy you...DESTROY YOU!!!" 
> 


I giggled when I heard this one!

I know its probablynot the source, but it reminded me of the octopus from Penguins and the snowglobe dragon from Neverwinter Nights.
My personal fav is, "If Bard and Kindred can pull of wearing a mask, so can I."
He has definitely got the most interesting VO lines. He does come across arrogant and mean, but somehow the word 'evil' seems a little too simplistic to describe him :/.

**He's an arrogant piece of star dragon, first and foremost, and that should be never denied nor omitted.**

But he speaks so much about **love**, and while he doesn't really respect anyone but his own kind, there are some who seem to amuse him or fill him with a type of wonder.

This was the biggest twist I've seen ever since a champion was announced. Everyone paint him the villain, but he's so much _more_.

"Love is as real a force as gravity. Try it once in a while."
"Stars are wonder and love ignited."
"Perhaps there is more to this world than I thought - not much, but enough."
"Humanity, surprisingly adept in the art of wrestling survival from the clutches of extinction."

He is also wise. He rarely gives advice, and even more rarely you are alive to hear it, but when you do...

"The depths of space crawl with terrible entities. Pray they ignore this world."
"I see a universe drained of life and heat, where not even a story will survive."
"A dragon's loyalty is a priceless gift. Do not waste it in the service of fools."

Summing it up, GG, 11/10, I _love_ this champion.
Star dragons, I imagine, always struggle to make the right first impression.

**Sees Sol's long lore**

( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Woo! Glad you like him! He definitely has a warm squishy place in my heart.
Agreed, 11/10 xD. I can't wait to read his story, I'm so curious to know what kind of people could really enslave something like him; they must be really powerful.
Definitely more of a chaotic neutral sorta guy

> [{quoted}](name=KingKold93,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=jdycZE5Z,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2016-03-08T21:33:55.377+0000)
>
> He has definitely got the most interesting VO lines. He does come across arrogant and mean, but somehow the word 'evil' seems a little too simplistic to describe him :/.

He doesn't seem like a enemy of Bard. He says '' Pick a dimension Bard, you're confusing them. '' At least that's what I understood.
His short lore is on the pbe apparently he's enslaved by some kind of space race (heavily implied to be the Targojians)
Its hard not to be arrogant when you are immortal and have the power to create stars.  Makes you look down on mortals who life spans are seconds to you.  But definitely the most interesting VO.
He's so shady, love him xD

Well stars do give off a lot of light, so he would have a lot of shade.  


I'll leave now.  Anyone have a portal for me?
Haha xD

Bravo Nasus, you ascended yourself to a dog!

lol haha, rektered.
Who is the voice actor? Is it David Lodge?

nps.

Does he actually have unique quotes for getting a Pentakill? Seems like he might.
"Cosmic dragon: 5, everyone else: 0. Please take notes."

Also "Darkness is my only true enemy."
{{champion:56}} lore rewrite confirmed?
He's probably talking about the darkness of space instead of Nocturne.

He seems to have a lot of quotes dealing with love..."You set my hearts ablaze." (Or something like that!) Anyone know who that's directed to? And why he seems to have some sort of respect for love? 
"I did mean to call you back, but stars needed foraging." Hah.

Hey guys question.
Aurelion Sol keeps referring to Targon as if they are an actual person. So Is he just referring to the mountain or is that the fifth Targon Champ????
I think he's referring to the vague pantheon of gods (who might actually be, like... Super-advanced beings instead of actually deities?) that inhabit Targon.

Like the place that Pantheons former self went to at the top of the mountain? 
It just seemed like A Sol was talking to an individual person named targon and seemed bound to him in some way.
It was  mentioned with his kit reveal that he was captured and made a slave to some intergalactic group. I suspect Targon is the name of said group.

Please tell me that the "twinkle twinkle little star" its a taunt for Veigar...

ok no
